ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC!
“TERROR IN TORONTO!”
Enter: the Wraith! He can walk through walls! Nothing can hold him! Nothing can stop him! And only one man dares to try: Malcolm Dragon!
*Contents* Enter: The Wraith Funnies: Berkeley Mews Funnies: Moonbeard Funnies: Gosh Is Dead Funnies: Dizzy Dramas Aquaria: Mer-Made In America Part IV
